sig_info: While his Opponent's back is near a wall, Annihilus Gains a Passive Aptitude, increasing the Potency of all Fury, Armor Up, and Precision Buffs by 9.99 to 100%.
While Annihlus’ back is near a wall he gains a Passive Block Penetration Buff, allowing all attacks to ignore 25.04 to 100% of the Opponents Block Proficiency.

COSMIC CONTROL ROD - BUFF: Annihilus gains the Cosmic Control Rod at the Start of the Fight.
Whenever the opponent activates a Nullify, Fateseal, or Stagger ability, The effect is Purified and the Cosmic Control Rod is removed for 10 seconds.
Immune to Incinerate, Frostbite, Coldsnap, Power Drain, Power Steal, Power Burn, Power Lock, and Enervate.
While Taunted, gain a True Accuracy Buff, an Unblockable Buff, and an Unstoppable Buff.
OBLITERATING STRIKES: While the Cosmic Control Rod is active, all attacks have a 60% chance to be an Obliterating Strike.
Obliterating Strikes are not affected by Ability Accuracy reduction.
Obliterating Strikes have a 100% chance to inflict Armor Break, reducing Armor Rating by 177.78 for 5 seconds.
Annihilus Purifies incoming Stun Debuffs while launching a Obliterating Strikes.
STIFLE (MAX 12): Obliterations trigger an Armor Break reducing Armor Rating by 9 and Offensive Combat Power Rate by 100% for 4 seconds.
While the Opponent is Stifled, Annihilus' first Medium Attack in a combo removes 1 Stifle and generates 1 Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by 24 for 0.90 seconds.
If the Opponent Dashes Back while Stifled, Annihilus removes 1 Stifle and gains 1 Unstoppable Buff lasting 1.10 seconds.
IT'S MIIIIINE--!: When the Cosmic Control Rod is Removed, Annihlus gains 3 Fury Buffs, each increasing Attack Rating by 32 for 10 seconds
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit Refreshes all Stifle Debuffs on the Opponent, the Final Hit Pauses the Duration of all active Stifles for 6 seconds.
Any Paused Stifles on the Opponent increase Annihilus’ Offensive Combat Power Rate by 9%
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: When Activating this Special, Annihilus consumes every Stifle on the Opponent, each generating 1 Fury increasing Attack Rating by 24 for 18 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Annihilus inflicts the Opponent with 10 Stifle Debuffs, each reducing Offensive Combat Power Rate by 9% for 4 seconds.
Until the Opponent has 0 Stifles remaining, the duration of Stifle Debuffs is increased by 125%

Obliterating Strikes are not affected by Ability Accuracy reduction.
Obliterating Strikes have a 100% chance to inflict Armor Break, reducing Armor Rating by 211.11 for 5 seconds.
Annihilus Purifies incoming Stun Debuffs while launching a Obliterating Strikes.
STIFLE (MAX 12): Obliterations trigger an Armor Break reducing Armor Rating by 9 and Offensive Combat Power Rate by 100% for 4 seconds.
While the Opponent is Stifled, Annihilus' first Medium Attack in a combo removes 1 Stifle and generates 1 Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by 195.6 for 0.90 seconds.
If the Opponent Dashes Back while Stifled, Annihilus removes 1 Stifle and gains 1 Unstoppable Buff lasting 1.10 seconds.
IT'S MIIIIINE--!: When the Cosmic Control Rod is Removed, Annihlus gains 3 Fury Buffs, each increasing Attack Rating by 260.8 for 10 seconds
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit Refreshes all Stifle Debuffs on the Opponent, the Final Hit Pauses the Duration of all active Stifles for 6 seconds.
Any Paused Stifles on the Opponent increase Annihilus’ Offensive Combat Power Rate by 9%
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: When Activating this Special, Annihilus consumes every Stifle on the Opponent, each generating 1 Fury increasing Attack Rating by 195.6 for 18 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Annihilus inflicts the Opponent with 10 Stifle Debuffs, each reducing Offensive Combat Power Rate by 9% for 4 seconds.
Until the Opponent has 0 Stifles remaining, the duration of Stifle Debuffs is increased by 125%
